channel.title: Looking for 1 content and 1 web developer [F2P Remake]
channel.description:
The source is a F2P (free-to-play) remake. I haven't done any work to it since the last release and don't intend to until the development team is full. We already have a client developer. The source is a Delta, that's not changing. Don't apply if you're not okay with that. The latest release can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,587965.0.html [b]Web Developer Requirements[/b] -Must have an understanding of HTML and possibly a basic understanding of JavaScript and CSS. -Must be able to show work to prove your experience. -Must be fairly respected on any RSPS community. -Must have skype. [b]Content Developer Requirements[/b] -Must have an understanding of Java. -Must be able to show work to prove your experience. -Must be fairly respected on any RSPS community. -Must have skype. Both applicants must speak and type good English. Whether it's your first language or not is irrelevant. You must have a good sense of responsibility, be a team-player and adequately meet deadlines. Nobody likes a buzz kill, a good sense of humour wouldn't hurt :) [b]Application:[/b]
Position: Experience: Why should I choose you?: Additional Information: Skype:
[b]Good luck![/b]

item.title: Looking for 1 content and 1 web developer [F2P Remake]
item.dc:creator: @lotlot56 lotlot56
item.description:
@lotlot56 wrote:

Position: Content Developer
Experience: 5 years of coding, owned 5+ server
Why should I choose you?: because i’m a beast? Haha i have alot of ideas and information to bring to the table i’m extreamly dedicated and I can be active at least 10 hours a day.
Additional Information: I am only 15, alot of people doubt me (because of my age) saying i’m immature before they even try to get to know me. yes, I was better at coding than i was at english…
Skype: cole.hooker

Read full topic

@The_Unholy wrote:

Oh dang I didn’t notice that, thanks for pointing that out haha. Just to clarify, content developer must have an adept understanding of Java and a Web Developer must have a novice experience in HTML.

item.title: Looking for 1 content and 1 web developer [F2P Remake]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

The source is a F2P (free-to-play) remake. I haven’t done any work to it since the last release and don’t intend to until the development team is full. We already have a client developer. The source is a Delta, that’s not changing. Don’t apply if you’re not okay with that.

The latest release can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,587965.0.html

Web Developer Requirements
-Must have an understanding of HTML and possibly a basic understanding of JavaScript and CSS.
-Must be able to show work to prove your experience.
-Must be fairly respected on any RSPS community.
-Must have skype.

Content Developer Requirements
-Must have an understanding of Java.
-Must be able to show work to prove your experience.
-Must be fairly respected on any RSPS community.
-Must have skype.

Both applicants must speak and type good English. Whether it’s your first language or not is irrelevant. You must have a good sense of responsibility, be a team-player and adequately meet deadlines. Nobody likes a buzz kill, a good sense of humour wouldn’t hurt

Application:

Position: Experience: Why should I choose you?: Additional Information: Skype:

Good luck!

Read full topic
